ing: 1 (20 ounce) can unsweetened pineapple chunks, drained
1 (12 ounce) jar apricot preserves or spreadable fruit
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
des: "Apricot preserves give a different twist to this saucy sweet-and-sour chicken from Melanie May of Fishers, Indiana. With just five ingredients, it's a snap to stir up and serve over rice."
ins: In a bowl, combine the first five ingredients. Transfer to a greased 2-qt baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through. Serve over rice.
